name: part_008
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Shirakami Fubuki performing 'Happy Synthesizer' on a beach stage.
Houshou Marine and Sakura Miko performing 'Sakuranbo Kiss ~Bakuhatsu Damo~n~' in a park at sunset.

subtitles.original: いつだって　きっと
subtitles.english: Always, surely

subtitles.original: 回ってるさ
subtitles.english: It's spinning around

subtitles.original: シンガソングで心躍らせ
subtitles.english: With a sing-a-song to make your heart dance

subtitles.original: ポジティブにさあ面舵いっぱい
subtitles.english: Stay positive, now hard-a-starboard

subtitles.original: 気持ち晴れ渡るその瞬間
subtitles.english: The moment your feelings clear up

subtitles.original: 全速前進だ
subtitles.english: Full speed ahead

subtitles.original: いつだってひとりじゃない
subtitles.english: You're never alone

subtitles.original: 私たちと一緒にさ
subtitles.english: Together with us

subtitles.original: ここでハッピーな人生を　イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Live a happy life here, yay!

subtitles.original: みんなでハッピーな人生を
subtitles.english: Let's all have a happy life

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: あれれ　おかしな鼓動ドキドキは
subtitles.english: Wait, what's this strange heartbeat?

subtitles.original: 君の腕の中で溢れだす
subtitles.english: It overflows within your arms

subtitles.original: ポロリ　こぼれた涙さくらんぼ
subtitles.english: A cherry tear falls

subtitles.original: もっとギュッと抱きしめてて
subtitles.english: Hold me tighter and tighter

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... High, high!

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ギュギュッ
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... Gyu gyu!

subtitles.original: まだまだかな　君のハート
subtitles.english: Is it not time yet? Your heart...

subtitles.original: ちょっとすっぱい　本当？
subtitles.english: Is a bit sour. Really?

subtitles.original: おやおやおや　待ちきれない
subtitles.english: Oh my, oh my, oh my, I can't wait

subtitles.original: このままじゃ　ええ　もっと
subtitles.english: At this rate... Eh? More?

subtitles.original: すました顔で　決めて　決めて
subtitles.english: With a serious face, decide, decide

subtitles.original: とまどう振りは　やだよ
subtitles.english: Don't pretend to be confused

subtitles.original: なにげなく　ふわっと　ふわっと
subtitles.english: Casually, lightly, lightly

subtitles.original: 手をまわして　そっと近づく
subtitles.english: Put your hands around me and gently come closer

subtitles.original: 本当はね　ずっと好きだったの　内緒だね
subtitles.english: Actually, I've always loved you. It's a secret, okay?

subtitles.original: イェイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: あれれ　小さな胸が震えてる
subtitles.english: Oh? My small heart is trembling

subtitles.original: 抱きしめてくれたら　飛んじゃうよ
subtitles.english: If you hold me, I'll fly away

subtitles.original: 夢で見てたのより　切ないね
subtitles.english: It's more painful than in my dreams

subtitles.original: 心もっと　そう　ギュッとしてて
subtitles.english: Squeeze my heart more, like that

subtitles.original: ポロリ　落ちた涙溢れちゃう
subtitles.english: Overflowing tears fall

subtitles.original: 大人になるための　痛みかな
subtitles.english: Is this the pain of growing up?

subtitles.original: 君に触れられた　ホッペ赤いクッキー
subtitles.english: My cheek you touched is like a red cookie

subtitles.original: ちょっとだけ　待ってて
subtitles.english: Wait just a little bit

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... High, high!

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ギュギュッ
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... Gyu gyu!

subtitles.original: やだやだやだ　余所見はやだ
subtitles.english: No, no, no, don't look elsewhere

subtitles.original: 夢中でいて　ブッブー！
subtitles.english: Stay obsessed with me. Beep-beep!

subtitles.original: ハラハラハラ　私はまだ
subtitles.english: My heart is pounding, I'm still...

subtitles.original: 子供だもん　でも
subtitles.english: Just a child, but...

subtitles.original: 君の余裕が　クサッと　クサッと
subtitles.english: Your composure pierces me...

subtitles.original: 胸の奥に　刺さるよ
subtitles.english: Pierces deep into my heart

subtitles.original: そんな私　ズバッと　ズバッと
subtitles.english: Make me change completely...

subtitles.original: 変身させてね　優しいキスで
subtitles.english: With a gentle kiss

subtitles.original: なんだかね　キュンとしちゃう　初めてだよ　イェイ！
subtitles.english: Somehow, my heart is throbbing. It's my first time. Yay!

subtitles.original: あれれ　唇震えている
subtitles.english: Oh? My lips are trembling

subtitles.original: 君のまつげが　瞳に映る
subtitles.english: Your eyelashes are reflected in my eyes

subtitles.original: 鼓動右肩上がり　急上昇
subtitles.english: My heartbeat is soaring rapidly

subtitles.original: だけじゃないよ　ちょっぴり幸せ
subtitles.english: It's not just that, I'm quite happy

subtitles.original: 時が　止まる瞬間に
subtitles.english: At the moment time stops

subtitles.original: 壊れそうな心　解かさ
subtitles.english: The heart that's about to break melts

subtitles.original: 赤く弾けた私さくらんぼ
subtitles.english: I popped red, a cherry

subtitles.original: 君とずっと繋がってたい
subtitles.english: I want to be connected with you forever

subtitles.original: 神様　この唇は彼と出会うために　生まれてきたのですね　イェイ！
subtitles.english: God, these lips were born to meet him, weren't they? Yay!

subtitles.original: すました顔で　決めて　決めて
subtitles.english: With a serious face, decide, decide

subtitles.original: とまどう振りは　やだよ
subtitles.english: Don't pretend to be confused

subtitles.original: なにげなく　ふわっと　ふわっと
subtitles.english: Casually, lightly, lightly

subtitles.original: 手をまわして　そっと近づく
subtitles.english: Put your hands around me and gently come closer

subtitles.original: だってね　こんなの初めてなの　内緒だよ　やったー！
subtitles.english: Because, this is my first time. It's a secret. Yay!

subtitles.original: あれれ　おかしな鼓動ドキドキは
subtitles.english: Wait, what's this strange heartbeat?

subtitles.original: 君の腕の中で溢れだす
subtitles.english: It overflows within your arms

subtitles.original: ポロリ　こぼれた涙さくらんぼ
subtitles.english: A cherry tear falls

subtitles.original: もっとギュッと抱きしめてて
subtitles.english: Hold me tighter and tighter

subtitles.original: 世界が　ぐるり回ってる
subtitles.english: The world is spinning around

subtitles.original: ふわふわ夢心地風任せ
subtitles.english: Fluffy, dreamy feeling, leave it to the wind

subtitles.original: ずっと待ってた恋は止まらない
subtitles.english: The love I've been waiting for won't stop

subtitles.original: だから　ずっと離さないで
subtitles.english: So don't ever let me go

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ハイハイ！
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... High, high!

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you...

subtitles.original: 好き好き好き　好き好き好き　ギュギュッ
subtitles.english: I love you, love you, love you... Gyu gyu!
